page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: Thornaby housing is of two different types, council houses and private houses. The two areas are separated by a main road.The council houses are less well built than the private houses,they have no trees around them and no front gardens.The council tenants must seek permission to paint or alter their property.Most council houses have flat roofs which let in rain and isn't very efficient.The council houses are mainly terraced.Private houses are either semi detached or detached.They have their own gardens,garages,pleasant surroundings and more space.The private estate has many trees and is clean and tidy.The only shops are in the council estate.The children gather around the shops and disturb the council house tenants.The private tenants don't have these problems.
